capabilities.description: Wyze Bridge is able to change file ownership.
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Wyze Bridge is able to set the setuid attribute on a file.
capabilities.name: SETUID

capabilities.description: Wyze Bridge is able to set the setgid attribute on a file.
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Wyze Bridge is able to bypass permission checks on operations that normally require the file system UID of the process to match the UID of the file.
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Wyze Bridge is able to bypass file read, write, and execute permission checks.
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

app_metadata.description: Create a local WebRTC, RTSP, RTMP, or HLS/Low-Latency HLS stream for most of your Wyze cameras
app_metadata.name: wyze-bridge

run_as_context.description: Wyze Bridge runs as the root user.

app_metadata.title: Wyze Bridge

attrs.description: The Wyze Bridge UI password.

attrs.description: Optional - Enable Audio from Cameras

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for wyze bridge.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Type

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>

1.0.3.readme:
Wyze-Bridge

Wyze-Bridge Create a local WebRTC, RTSP, RTMP, or HLS/Low-Latency HLS stream for most of your Wyze cameras
